blurb: Decentralized P2P audio/radio streaming system & platform with verifiable manifests and swarm distribution.
description: ISAN is a decentralized streaming fabric for radio/audio. Publishers ingest audio, chunk and sign segments, and announce via a DHT; listeners fetch via peer swarms (WebRTC/QUIC) with HTTP fallback. Station manifests define identity, codecs, fallbacks, and optional LN/WebLN tipping. This page includes a local demo player for standard HTTP streams; P2P nodes and signaling are separate components.
